jd: This is Shiva Manish I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our premier clients. Since it is an urgent business requirement your prompt response is appreciated.Job Title: Oracle PL/SQL Developer Location: Pittsburgh, PA (Onsite)Pay rate:$50/hr on c2c Minimum 6 to 12 years’ Experience in product development Having good IT experience as an ORACLE PL/SQL Developer, involved in Requirement Gathering, analysis, Design, Development, Unit Testing, Production Deployment and Support.At least 4 years of experience in SQL and PL/SQL programming, developing complex code units.Solid Experience of creating PL/SQL Packages, Procedures, Functions, Triggers, Types, Views in Oracle.Knowledge of manufacturing processes. Knowledge on Steel/Aluminum industry process would be preferred.knowledge of ISA 95.knowledge of integration between MES , L2, ERP systems.Understanding and Collecting requirements from Business user side or Business Analyst and try to convert that requirement to PL SQL.Responsible for performance tuning activities in the project.Willing to relocate to Pittsburgh. Willing to work 50% of the time from office, sometimes flexible based on local teams decisions. Willing to travel to client location on important occasions like deployment, factory test etc.
